rooms.description: Large entrance hall with traditional Kerala-style motifs and natural lighting.
Open living space that connects to the dining area and balcony. Emphasis on natural ventilation and Vastu alignment ensuring energy flow.
Integrated dining space within the living room or adjacent to it with access to the balcony.
Master bedroom with a spacious balcony overlooking a garden or courtyard. Ensures privacy and natural light.
Small yet functional servant's quarters integrated into the layout for convenience.
Traditional Kerala kitchen with adequate storage and ventilation. Placed in a location that respects Vastu guidelines by avoiding direct alignment with main entrances.
Bathroom attached to the master bedroom for privacy and convenience.

openings.description: Traditional Kerala-style wooden door with intricate detailing. Positioned as per Vastu to allow a positive energy flow.
Large window in the master bedroom balcony for enhanced natural light and ventilation.
Spacious balcony attached to the master bedroom ensuring outdoor view and relaxation space.
Balcony window for the living room enhancing cross ventilation in adherence to Vastu principles.
